p: All the chemicals and solvents used for analyses were of analytical purity grade. Dichlorometan, methanol, ethanol, chloroform, ethyl acetate, formic acid and aluminum chloride hexahydrate were purchased from POCH S.A. (Gliwice, Poland). The FCR and standards (apigenin, luteolin, caffeic acid, chlorogenic acid, gallic acid, rosmarinic acid, (–)-catechin, rutin, and quercetin were purchased from Sigma-Aldrich (Poznań, Poland)
